pr_title: HIVE-23618: Enable event replication for default/check constraints

timeline.bodyText: Please add comments and unit tests for these classes
timeline.author: aasha

replies.bodyText:
Added comments.
I couldn't find any existing unit tests for other *Handler classes, and since TestReplicationScenarios in itests is covering this end-to-end, I skipped unit tests.
replies.author: adesh-rao

timeline.bodyText: Add similar tests for external tables.
timeline.author: aasha

replies.bodyText: External tables don't support default/check constraints yet. So, skipped adding for external table.
replies.author: adesh-rao

timeline.bodyText: Add multiple check constraints for the same table and test if all of them are replicated.
timeline.author: aasha
sankarh

replies.bodyText: done. Thought changed it to colsInMsg

timeline.bodyText: Add ALTER operations to change the constraints and validate it for incremental repl.

replies.bodyText: Alter table can either add or drop the constraints. Since the drop was already there, I have added through alter too.
